attributes.action: Increase Carer's Allowance to National Minimum Wage for Hours Worked
attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls on the UK government to: 

Recognize the Value of Care Work: Acknowledge the vital contribution carers make to society and the
economy.

Increase Carer's Allowance: Raise the allowance to at least the National Minimum Wage for the actual hours of care provided, between 35 and 84 hours per week.

Ensure Fair Compensation: Provide carers with fair financial support that reflects the demands and responsibilities of their role.
attributes.background: Carers provide essential support to people with disabilities, enabling them to live independently and with dignity. Despite the vital role they play, Carer's Allowance currently equates to just £2.34 an hour, far below the National Minimum Wage of £11.44 for those aged 21 and over.
